

Installation
=============

The package itself can be obtained from bitbucket: ::

    git clone https://vargatn@bitbucket.org/vargatn/proclens.git


There are two modes: *pipeline* and *API*.

API mode
------------

The *API* mode can be accessed by installing the python package: ::

    python setup.py install

Then simply import it in a python session: ::

   import proclens



Pipeline mode:
---------------

*coming soon*
